name: Fuzzible
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fuzzible friends
des:
The worlds of plush and technology collide with the kid friendly Fuzzible skill for Alexa! Fuzzible Friends™ are adorably soft, plush animals that speak their own unique language. When paired with a compatible Amazon Echo device, the Fuzzible skill for Alexa magically translates their funny little language to yours! 

Once you’ve successfully paired your Fuzzible Friend with your Echo device and enabled the skill, Alexa will indicate that your Fuzzible plush is ready to play. Just squeeze your Fuzzible’s left paw to begin interacting and watch as its antenna lights up. When playing connected to an Amazon Echo device, your child can interact with their Fuzzible Friend by playing color guessing games, choosing their own story adventure and more! Fuzzible Friends™ plush have over 40 sounds and 140 translated Alexa phrases! 

Hardware requirements: 1 Fuzzible Friend plush and 1 compatible Amazon Echo device.

To enable the skill, simply say “Alexa, let’s play Fuzzible Friends™.” 

To quit, just say “Alexa, stop” anytime during connected play. 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Fuzzible Skill for Alexa may include the use of anonymous persistent identifiers for skill management purposes, for example, to randomize stories across sessions.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
